item.title: Contact
item.description: Welcome to my web page where I write some of my projects with my concerns about privacy, security and internet in today’s world. This web page has been created for the purpose of both creating my personal portfolio and sharing information. ​ ​ If there is a topic that interests you in what I have written, I welcome your ideas and of course your Github pull requests. If you want to contact me:
